description: Brighter AB engages in the development of solutions for data-driven and mobile health services. The company is headquartered in Kista, Stockholm and currently employs 127 full-time employees. The company went IPO on 2012-02-03. The firm offers solutions related to diabetes care, welfare technology and digital healthcare services. Brighter AB (publ) is a Parent Company, that operates through group of subsidiaries. The group’s main purpose is to improve health and wellbeing amongst the global population through development of technical and digital medical devices with a primary area of application in the treatment of diabetes. The firm reports the following operating segments: Brighter, Camanio and Nectarine Health.
name: Brighter AB (publ)
